title: MusicGroup
description: A musical group, such as a band, an orchestra, or a choir. Can also be a solo musician.

allOf.description: A performance group, such as a band, an orchestra, or a circus.

track.description: A music recording (track)—usually a single song. If an ItemList is given, the list should contain items of type MusicRecording.

genre.description: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.

tracks.description: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.

musicGroupMember.description: A member of a music group—for example, John, Paul, George, or Ringo.
